label: 朝臣
説明文: Ranked as the second highest title in 684, this title was given to powerful imperial chieftains (Ōmi) and deity chieftains (muraji). Since the Fujiwara clan, who held this hereditary title, became the most powerful clan in Japan, ason became the most coveted hereditary title and came to rank as No. 1, supplanting mahito. [大臣、連、真人]
